page.title: 15Housing
page.content: Altough on the fringe of Runcorn new town there are a lot of much older properties in the surrounding country. Most of these houses are detached and very luxurious, the front gardens extensive and the back gardens very large. Some even had croquet lawns. Most people own there own houses and some of the more expensive costing upwards of Â£70,000. The average is one of four bedrooms, having been owned for 15 years with them moving in because they liked the area. Residents are generally satisfied with the location of the houses but not about the local entertainment. Concern was expressed over emergency accident facilities being at Halton or Warrington. Gardens are large enough for children to play safely as there is no pavement to the road.
